com.coveo.spillway.storage

Interface LimitUsageStorage

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AsyncLimitUsageStorage, InMemoryStorage, RedisStorage

    public interface LimitUsageStorage
    Interface that defines a distributed storage that could be used with Spillway.
    Since:
    1.0.0
    Author:
    Guillaume Simard

    • Method Detail

      • incrementAndGet

        default org.apache.commons.lang3.tuple.Pair<LimitKey,java.lang.Integer> incrementAndGet(java.lang.String resource,
                                                                                        java.lang.String limitName,
                                                                                        java.lang.String property,
                                                                                        java.time.Duration expiration,
                                                                                        java.time.Instant eventTimestamp)
        Increments the specified limit by one and returns the current count.
        Parameters:
        resource - The resource name on which the limit is enforced
        limitName - The name of the limit
        property - The name of the property used in the limit
        expiration - The duration of the limit before it is reset
        eventTimestamp - The Instant at which the event was recorded
        Returns:
        A Pair of the limit and its current count

      • addAndGet

        default org.apache.commons.lang3.tuple.Pair<LimitKey,java.lang.Integer> addAndGet(java.lang.String resource,

        Increments the specified limit by the cost and returns the current count.
        Parameters:
        resource - The resource name on which the limit is enforced
        limitName - The name of the limit
        property - The name of the property used in the limit
        expiration - The duration of the limit before it is reset
        eventTimestamp - The Instant at which the event was recorded
        cost - The cost the query
        Returns:
        A Pair of the limit and its current count

      • addAndGet

        default org.apache.commons.lang3.tuple.Pair<LimitKey,java.lang.Integer> addAndGet(AddAndGetRequest request)
        Increments the specified limit by the cost and returns the current count.
        Parameters:
        request - An AddAndGetRequest that wraps all necessary information to perform the increment
        Returns:
        A Pair of the limit and its current count

      • addAndGet

        java.util.Map<LimitKey,java.lang.Integer> addAndGet(java.util.Collection<AddAndGetRequest> requests)
        Processes all AddAndGetRequest and returns the current count for each limit.
        Parameters:
        requests - An collection of AddAndGetRequest that wrap all necessary information to perform the increments
        Returns:
        A Map of the limits and their current count

      • debugCurrentLimitCounters

        java.util.Map<LimitKey,java.lang.Integer> debugCurrentLimitCounters()
        Returns:
        A Map of all the enforced limits and their current count
